title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.16 - Horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.16 - Horses

State Regulations

Horses shall be allowed in the parks only if specifically
approved pursuant to a permit, or if used by a police officer in the exercise
of his duties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
